ebook lms PX_FacePlate_Support_Widget For help, call 1-877-587-6534 or click here for more options For Technical Support, call 1-877-587-6534 between 9:00 AM - 3:00 AM Monday-Thursday, Friday 9:00 AM - 11:00 PM, Saturday 11:30 AM - 8:00 PM and Sunday 11:30 AM - 11:00 PM (all times EST), or fill out the support request form. true Assignment PX_TEMPLATES x Dropbox
A Dropbox in which the student can submit a document which will be graded by the instructor 8fb2fe4aa2f0494c8f6caa62eaabf101 Templates/Data/8fb2fe4aa2f0494c8f6caa62eaabf101/index.html PT1M 0 true 2 0 -1 true 100 1 0 Dropbox Dropbox 1 1 1|2 2 PX_TEMPLATES a Unit
A unit often contains a number of resources and activities that are conceptually connected. Generally, units correspond to chapters or major topics in the course, and the materials within each unit are designed to drive students to an understanding of that concept. A unit may contain items of different types, and thus build a progression of learning; for example, a prereading assessment, an ebook reading, an activity, and a summative quiz.

Typical Uses
• Prebuilt modules of Launchpad
• Instructor-built collections of resources 429ef3606d6a45a695a8dd0225ee9518 PT1M 0 0 -1 false 100 1 0 PxUnit Unit Discussion PX_TEMPLATES e Discussion Board
A communication tool that allows users to post a comment or question online. Other users may respond with their own remarks over time. Portal discussion boards include tools for instructors to read, grade, and view reports on activity.

Typical Uses
• Instructors post questions for students to answer.
• Instructors can provide a rubric or other grading guidelines and assess students on their contributions
• Student commentary on an aspect of class such as a reading, activity, or concept
• Peer-led learning and collaboration
5639c5e11e83479abbaeff34beb94e16 Templates/Data/5639c5e11e83479abbaeff34beb94e16/index.html PT1M 0 0 -1 100 1 0 Discussion 1 1 1|2 2 PX_TEMPLATES g Folder
An organizational tool, which may contain other resources. Most often, an instructor would create a folder to hold related items, such as all links, assets, or files associated with a certain topic, project, or due date. 6e91f1119c464e55b8851b15419d1c67 Templates/Data/6e91f1119c464e55b8851b15419d1c67/index.html PT1M 0 0 -1 100 1 0 Folder Resource PX_TEMPLATES f Document Collection
A repository for useful files, typically those employed in the delivery of course information or material that offers educational support. The collection may be organized, referenced, or assigned by instructors for students to access

Typical Uses
• A location to host course information, policies, or processes.
• A location to host documents related to activities or labs, articles, or worksheets to be used in class.
83a8a14d1cc34a54b84868257ac3f165 Templates/Data/83a8a14d1cc34a54b84868257ac3f165/index.html PT1M 0 0 -1 100 1 0 DocumentCollection Document 0|1 0 2 2 CustomActivity PX_TEMPLATES n Learning Curve An assignment primarily designed to assess knowledge. 79e70863484b443b81793043eb5c3a4f Templates/Data/79e70863484b443b81793043eb5c3a4f/index.html PT1M 0 0 -1 100 1 0 LearningCurveActivity LearningCurveActivity LearningCurveActivity 1|2 1 0|2 0 Assessment PX_TEMPLATES k Quiz
An assignment primarily designed to assess knowledge. Quizzes replicate the experience of traditional in-class quizzes, in that they are often timed and do not incorporate support opportunities.

Typical Uses
• Reading verification
• Summative Assessment
88161c2783b949ed805d56fc5a1a1349 a PT1M 0 0 -1 100 1 2 0 1 testing Quiz Quiz custom settings 1|2 1 0|2 0 Resource PX_TEMPLATES j Link Collection
A straightforward method to provide students with a collection of links to other useful destinations on the Web. Instructors create the content through an easy-to-use editor.

Typical Uses
• To provide enrichment, support, or other external resources relevant to the course.
95f884c8be2e430597f50e43c9057727 Templates/Data/95f884c8be2e430597f50e43c9057727/index.html PT1M 0 0 -1 100 1 0 LinkCollection LinkCollection 0|1 0 2 2 Resource PX_TEMPLATES i HTML Page
A flexible blank slate on which an instructor can incorporate any HTML-based content. The page HTML page can incorporate links, images, or active multimedia content. HTML pages within the Portal can be produced through an easy-touse editor.

Typical Uses
• General content such as announcements, policies, explanations
a9435305a14e472ba2e503653c520538 Templates/Data/a9435305a14e472ba2e503653c520538/index.html PT1M 0 0 -1 100 1 0 HtmlDocument HtmlDocument 0|1 0 2 2 RssFeed PX_TEMPLATES l RSS Feed c2e80347203e4b9b98f1b85d8b605e0f PT1M 0 0 -1 100 1 0 RssFeed Homework PX_TEMPLATES h Homework
An assignment primarily designed to reinforce knowledge provided in lecture, reading, or other activities. Homework is generally graded and often incorporates some level of support to help students arrive at the correct answer or understand where they need help. For example, homework may link to the ebook, tutorials, or answer-specific feedback.

Typical Uses
• Student self-check or practice problems
• Reading verification
• PreLecture, PreLab, or formative assessment dcef7cf5ba194495a7c86145b557bc15 Templates/Data/dcef7cf5ba194495a7c86145b557bc15/index.html PT1M 0 0 -1 100 1 2 0 Homework Homework 1|2 1 0|2 0 Resource PX_TEMPLATES g Link
A straightforward method to provide students with a link to a useful destination on the Web. Instructors create the content through an easy-to-use editor.

Typical Uses
• To provide enrichment, support, or other external resources relevant to the course.
